snippet: A statement from the American Embassy in Ankara did not name the supposed planners, but it did say the offices of a Western-backed Syrian opposition group might be the target.
abstract: United States Embassy in Ankara issues warning that extremist groups may be planning attack in Turkey on National Coalition for Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces, an umbrella Syrian opposition group with international recognition; specifies that their office in Gaziantep, city near the border with Syria, is likely the target.
lead_paragraph: A statement from the American Embassy in Ankara did not name the supposed planners, but it did say the offices of a Western-backed Syrian opposition group might be the target.

headline.main: U.S. Warns of Attack in Turkey
headline.print_headline: U.S. Warns of Attack in Turkey
